TITLE: Bus of migrants help mother give birth before being detained in Mexico
SUMMARY: She was among a group of mostly Guatemalans — including 26 unaccompanied minors — found on the bus in the Gulf state of Veracruz, according to the National Migration Institute

TITLE: Actor Julian Sands confirmed dead after going missing months ago in California mountains
SUMMARY: Sands was hiking in Angeles National Forest, which was left wet and icy after a series of Pacific storms, when he was reporting missing Jan. 13
